report.title: Occurrences Download 2 by input date, spatial indexed
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the explore report parameters, filtered by input date. Requires the spatial index builder for location filters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences co JOIN occurrences o on o.id=co.id AND o.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN locations l on l.id=ils.location_id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id AND ctt.term='Vice County' ) on ils.sample_id=co.sample_id LEFT JOIN (occurrence_attribute_values det_full_val JOIN occurrence_attributes det_full on det_full.id=det_full_val.occurrence_attribute_id and det_full.deleted=false and det_full.system_function='det_full_name' ) ON det_full_val.occurrence_id=co.id AND det_full_val.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (occurrence_attribute_values det_first_val JOIN occurrence_attributes det_first on det_first.id=det_first_val.occurrence_attribute_id and det_first.deleted=false and det_first.system_function='det_full_name' ) ON det_first_val.occurrence_id=co.id AND det_first_val.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (occurrence_attribute_values det_last_val JOIN occurrence_attributes det_last on det_last.id=det_last_val.occurrence_attribute_id and det_last.deleted=false and det_last.system_function='det_full_name' ) ON det_last_val.occurrence_id=co.id AND det_last_val.deleted=false JOIN websites w on w.id=co.website_id JOIN users u ON u.id=o.created_by_id JOIN people p ON p.id=u.person_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND co.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR co.record_status not in ('D','R')) #idlist#

param.name: date_from
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.updated_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.updated_on <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

modifiers.where: co.certainty IS NOT NULL AND co.certainty='C' AND co.record_status NOT IN ('D','R')
(co.certainty in ('C', 'L') OR (co.certainty IS NULL)) AND co.record_status NOT IN ('D','R'))

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN index_locations_samples lfilter ON lfilter.sample_id=o.sample_id and lfilter.location_id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: ownGroups
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tgfilter ON tgfilter.id=co.taxon_group_id AND tgfilter.id IN (#taxon_groups#)

param.name: surveys
param.description: List of survey IDs to view data for

param.name: ownSurveys
param.join: JOIN surveys su ON su.id=co.survey_id AND su.id IN (#surveys#)

column.name: sample_id
column.sql: case when o.sensitivity_precision is null then co.sample_id else null end

column.name: location_name
column.sql: case when o.sensitivity_precision is null then co.location_name else 'Sensitive. Lat long is approximate.' end

column.name: entered_sref
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then co.public_entered_sref else replace(co.public_entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(s.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else case length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')) when 5 then 2000 else pow(10, (12-length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')))/2) end end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN w.id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE w.title || '->' END || co.recorders

column.name: determiner
column.sql: CASE WHEN det_full_val.text_value IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN det_last_val.text_value IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE det_last_val.text_value || COALESCE(', ' || det_first_val.text_value, '') END ELSE det_full_val.text_value END

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Input still in progress' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Record Submitted' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE o.record_status END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(co.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: certainty
column.sql: CASE co.certainty WHEN 'C' THEN 'Certain' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Likely' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Uncertain' END

column.name: recorder_person_id
column.sql: case when co.recorders = p.surname || ', ' || p.first_name or co.recorders = p.first_name || ' ' || p.surname then cast(p.id as varchar(20)) else 'unknown' end

column.name: determiner_person_id
column.sql: case when co.recorders = det_last_val.text_value || ', ' || det_first_val.text_value or co.recorders = det_first_val.text_value || ' ' || det_last_val.text_value or co.recorders = det_full_val.text_value then cast(p.id as varchar(20)) else 'unknown' end
